amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the extension of seven campsite leases in Biscayne National Park, Florida, collectively known as "Stiltsville" .
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prevent use of funds in the bill may be used to pay salaries and expenses of personnel of the Department of the Interior to extend leases, any standstill agreement, or the terms of the settlement agreement that took effect March 30, 2001, concerning the holders of interests in seven campsite leases in Biscayne National Park, Florida, identified as campsite leases collectively known as "Stiltsville".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Deutsch amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 222 (Roll no. 183).
